May 11, 1940 D Edinburgh Charities Contest
Edinburgh Charities Contest 0 Other
edinburgh-charities-contest
March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Central Halls, Edinburgh, City of Edinburgh, Scotland, UK March contest 1st Broxburn, 2nd Armadale Public. Hymn tune 1st Dysart, 2nd Armadale Silver. Best section 2 band - Dysart. Best section 3 band - Musselburgh.
9 bands competed.
March 1, 2013, 10:58 a.m. Jan. 26, 2019, 3:51 p.m.
1 Tullis Russell Mills John Haldane
2 Wellesley Colliery Band William Pegg
3 Dysart Colliery Silver Band John Faulds
4 Musselburgh & Fisherrow Trades John Faulds
5 Broxburn Public Band J. Riley
Unknown Result Armadale Burgh J. B. Fullerton
Unknown Result Armadale Silver George J. Grant
